skill.name: youtube-downloader
skill.description: Download YouTube videos with customizable quality and format options. Use this skill when the user asks to download, save, or grab YouTube videos. Supports various quality settings (best, 1080p, 720p, 480p, 360p), multiple formats (mp4, webm, mkv), and audio-only downloads as MP3.
skill.summary: Download YouTube videos with customizable quality and format options. Use this skill when the user a...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate YouTube video downloader using the trusted yt-dlp library. All subprocess calls use list-based arguments preventing injection. The static scanner flagged C2 keywords, weak crypto, and system reconnaissance, but these are false positives triggered by benign strings in documentation and metadata files. Code behavior matches stated purpose.

content.user_title: Download YouTube videos in any quality
content.value_statement: Save YouTube videos for offline viewing with full control over quality and format. Get the best available resolution or choose specific settings like 1080p, 720p, or extract audio as MP3.
actual_capabilities: Download YouTube videos in best available quality
Select output format: MP4, WebM, MKV
Extract audio only as MP3 file
Custom output directory for saved files
limitations: Downloads single videos only (playlists not supported)
Download speed depends on your internet connection
Very long videos may take significant time and storage

use_cases.title: Save reference videos
use_cases.description: Download tutorial videos and presentations for offline review and backup.

use_cases.title: Build study libraries
use_cases.description: Save educational content and language learning videos for offline practice.

use_cases.title: Extract audio content
use_cases.description: Convert video content to MP3 audio for listening during commutes.

prompt_templates.title: Audio extraction
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract the audio from this video as MP3: [VIDEO_URL]

prompt_templates.title: Custom format
prompt_templates.prompt: Download this video in 1080p as WebM format: [VIDEO_URL]

output_examples.input: Extract audio as MP3 from this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXAMPLE

best_practices: Use specific quality settings to manage file size for long videos
Choose MP3 extraction for podcasts and music content
Specify custom output directory to organize downloads by topic
anti_patterns: Do not attempt to download copyrighted content without permission
Avoid downloading very large playlist URLs (only single videos supported)
Do not ignore download errors without checking output location

faq.question: Which YouTube URLs are supported?
faq.answer: Most YouTube video URLs work including youtu.be short links and standard watch URLs.

faq.question: Can I use this with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill supports Claude, Codex, and Claude Code tools seamlessly.

faq.question: Where are files saved?
faq.answer: Downloads go to /mnt/user-data/outputs by default. Use -o flag to specify a different directory.

faq.question: Why did download fail?
faq.answer: Common causes: invalid URL, video removed, network issues, or insufficient disk space.

faq.question: How is this different from browser extensions?
faq.answer: This tool runs in your terminal with full quality control and audio extraction options.
